com.javaweb.model.dao

Interface BookContract

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseDAO

    public interface BookContract
    It is good practice to show structure of database in the 'contract' class. Here are name of tables and columns of these tables. Also here are sql queries.
    Author:
    Andrii Chernysh
